column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a Chicago native
column2: Lou's is by far my favorite deep dish around. The Lou deep dish pizza is made with fresh veggies and packed with flavor. We also always order the Malnati salad which is a blend of salty and savory like no other! You can't go wrong with anything on the menu
column3: but if you haven't tried either of these- they are a MUST!
